(May 7, 2005).\n           <a class="external text" href="http://daleandersen.seti.org/Dale_Andersen/Science_articles_files/Heldmann%20et%20al.2005.pdf" rel="nofollow">\n            "Formation of Martian gullies by the action of liquid water flowing under current Martian environmental conditions"\n           </a>\n           <span style="font-size:85%;">\n            (PDF)\n           </span>\n           .\n           <i>\n            <a href="/wiki/Journal_of_Geophysical_Research" title="Journal of Geophysical Research">\n             Journal of Geophysical Research\n            </a>\n           </i>\n           .\n           <b>\n            110\n           </b>\n           (E5): Eo5004.\n           <a href="/wiki/Bibcode" title="Bibcode">\n            Bibcode\n           </a>\n           :\n           <a class="external text" href="http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2005JGRE..11005004H" rel="nofollow">\n            2005JGRE..11005004H\n           </a>\n           .\n           <a href="/wiki/Digital_object_identifier" title="Digital object identifier">\n            doi\n           </a>\n           :\n           <a class="external text" href="//doi.org/10.1029%2F2004JE002261" rel="nofollow">\n            10.1029/2004JE002261\n           </a>\n           <span class="reference-accessdate">\n            . Retrieved\n            <span class="nowrap">\n             September 17,\n            </span>\n            2008\n           </span>\n           .\n          </cite>\n          <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Journal+of+Geophysical+Research&amp;rft.atitle=Formation+of+Martian+gullies+by+the+action+of+liquid+water+flowing+under+current+Martian+environmental+conditions&amp;rft.volume=110&amp;rft.issue=E5&amp;rft.pages=Eo5004&amp;rft.date=2005-05-07&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1029%2F2004JE002261&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2005JGRE..11005004H&amp;rft.aulast=Heldmann&amp;rft.aufirst=Jennifer+L.&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fdaleandersen.seti.org%2FDale_Andersen%2FScience_articles_files%2FHeldmann%2520et%2520al.2005.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMars">\n           <span style="display:none;">\n           </span>\n          </span>\n          \'conditions such as now occur on Mars, outside of the temperature-pressure stability regime of liquid water\'\xe2\x80\xa6 \'Liquid water is typically stable at the lowest elevations and at low latitudes on the planet because the atmospheric pressure is greater than the\n          <a href="/wiki/Vapor_pressure" title="Vapor pressure">\n           vapor pressure\n          </a>\n          of water and surface temperatures in equatorial regions can reach 273 K for parts of the day [Haberle\n          <i>\n           et al\n          </i>\n          ., 2001]\'\n         </span>\n        </li>\n        <li id="cite_note-kostama-29">\n         <span class="mw-cite-backlink">\n          ^\n          <a href="#cite_ref-kostama_29-0">\n           <sup>\n            <i>\n             <b>\n              a\n             </b>\n            </i>\n           </sup>\n          </a>\n          <a href="#cite_ref-kostama_29-1">\n           <sup>\n            <i>\n             <b>\n              b\n             </b>\n            </i>\n           </sup>\n          </a>\n          <a href="#cite_ref-kostama_29-2">\n           <sup>\n            <i>\n             <b>\n              c\n             </b>\n            </i>\n           </sup>\n          </a>\n         </span>\n         <span class="reference-text">\n          <cite class="citation journal">\n           Kostama, V.-P.; Kreslavsky, M. A.; Head, J. W. (June 3, 2006).\n           <a class="external text" href="http://www.agu.org/pubs/crossref/2006/2006GL025946.shtml" rel="nofollow">\n            "Recent high-latitude icy mantle in the northern plains of Mars: Characteristics and ages of emplacement"\n           </a>\n           .\n           <i>\n            Geophysical Research Letters\n           </i>\n           .\n           <b>\n            33\n           </b>\n           (11): L11201.\n           <a href="/wiki/Bibcode" title="Bibcode">\n            Bibcode\n           </a>\n           :\n           <a class="external text" href="http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2006GeoRL..3311201K" rel="nofollow">\n            2006GeoRL..3311201K\n           </a>\n           .\n           <a href="/wiki/Digital_object_identifier" title="Digital object identifier">\n            doi\n           </a>\n           :\n           <a class="external text" href="//doi.org/10.1029%2F2006GL025946" rel="nofollow">\n            10.1029/2006GL025946\n           </a>\n           <span class="reference-accessdate">\n            . Cartographic resources\n       </b>\n      </p>\n      <ul>\n       <li>\n        <a class="external text" href="http://planetarynames.wr.usgs.gov/Page/MARS/target" rel="nofollow">\n         Mars Mars\n        </a>\n        by the United States Geological Survey\n       </li>\n       <li>\n        <a class="external text" href="http://planetologia.elte.hu/terkep/mars-viking-en.pdf" href="/wiki/Template:Solar_System" title="Template:Solar System">\n              <abbr style="text-align:center;;;background:none
